official_title: Lay Health Worker Expanded Intervention in Community Oncology Practices
inclusion_criteria:
* Newly diagnosed or relapsed cancer diagnosis.
* 75 years or older
* Diagnosis of relapse or progressive disease (any cancer diagnosis) as identified by imaging or biopsy and confirmed by physician.
* Must have capacity to verbally consent
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 75 Years
Must have maximum age of 100 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Inability to consent to the study due to lack of capacity as documented by the referring physician.
